ComicInfo.Title: On a Gut Level; Angels of Tarzana; Near Mint; Day by Day with Hopey: “Saturday is Shatterday”; Kid Stuff Kids 6
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hopey goes on a picnic, to a rock 'n' roll show and the bathroom in "Saturday is Shatter Day," the latest installment of "Day by Day with Hopey." And on the Beto side of the book, "On a Gut Level" features the return on Palomar's original heartbreaker Pipo, trapped in a mysterious castle with Fritz, her ex Mark Hererra, and his wife Mila...plus another "Kid Stuff Kids"! VIVA LOS BROS!
Story Titles"The Kid Stuff Kids" by Beto"Day By Day with Hopey: Saturday is Shatterday" by Jaime"Near Mint" by Jaime"Angels of Tarzana" by Jaime"On a Gut Level" by Beto

ComicInfo.Characters: Angel Rivera, Fritzi, Hopey Glass, Kiko Kurihara, Maggie Chascarillo, Mark Herrera, Mila Castellon, Pipo Jiminez, Ray Dominguez, Terry Downe, Vivian Solis
